sections.title: Objective
sections.content: I'm a newly-graduated software engineer highly motivated to begin work in a challenging environment. A great employer should provide opportunities for growth, and I'm seeking to sharpen a diverse programming skillset and apply this to efficiently solve problems to that end. My experience in leadership positions has given me valuable insights into team roles and how they can be recognized to achieve shared goals, giving me the clarity required to be a competitive asset.

bullets: Traveled to medical facilities across North America to facilitate equipment relocation to new sites
Interfaced with local teams to integrate large-scale IT systems
Planned and taught programming classes to high school students
Taught useful design patterns and organized hands-on projects
Worked closely with clients to manage their financial needs.
